item.title: Data show a big difference between hospital and office anesthesia safety
item.description: Today's healthcare consumers have more choices than ever before. When it comes to surgeries and procedures, patients have the option of having them done in an office setting or a hospital operating room. Patients also have the option of selecting a physician anesthesiologist or nurse anesthetist to provide anesthesia care, although many facilities do not present it as a choice. Why have a procedure in an office instead of a hospital operating room?

item.title: Data shows a big difference between hospital and office anesthesia safety
item.description: From a medical malpractice perspective, how can patients ensure they are receiving safe and effective anesthesia care outside of a hospital setting?
